# qrandom

### install
`pip install qrandom`

### Use
```
>>> from qrandom import qrandom as qr
>>> qgen = qr.build_generator(8)
>>> random_string, bit_count, one_count = qr.generate_and_count(qgen)
>>> random_string
'0000000011111010010011011100000100111010000101111101111010100000'
>>> bit_count
64
>>> one_count
29
>>>total_count, total_ones = qr.run_for_seconds(random_number_generator=qgen, seconds=2, verbose=True)

>>> total_count
1200
>>> total_ones
583
>>> result, (range_low, range_high), ratio = qr.get_two_sigma_scoring(total_count, total_ones)
>>> result
0
>>> range_low
565.3589838486224
>>> range_high
634.6410161513776
>>> ratio
0.9716666666666667
```
